t_cases = int(raw_input())

for i in range(t_cases):
    no = int(raw_input())
    score_store = {}
    for j in range(no):
        entry = raw_input()
        entry = entry.split(" ")
        if entry[0] in score_store:
            new_val = score_store[entry[0]]+int(entry[1])
            score_store[entry[0]] = new_val
        else:
            score_store[entry[0]] = int(entry[1])
    h_score = 0
    for k in score_store:
        if score_store[k] > h_score:
            h_score = score_store[k]
            h_scrorer = k
    print h_scrorer,h_score
